item.title: 福陆将剥离中国合资企业股份
item.description: COOEC 将通过其子公司收购福陆在合资企业中的全部股权【原文：COOEC, through its subsidiary, will acquire Fluor’s entire equity interest in joint venture】

item.description: 井口平台的 EPC 计划于本月启动【原文：EPC for wellhead platforms is scheduled to commence this month】

item.title: Seatrium 和马士基解决了 4.75 亿美元的合同纠纷
item.description: Seatrium 将于明年交付该船，马士基将根据部分计息信贷计划付款【原文：Seatrium will deliver the vessel next year with payment from Maersk under a partial interest-bearing credit scheme】

item.title: 澳大利亚海上天然气项目计划租赁 FPSO

item.description: UK supermajor’s Nashville well in Norphlet region deemed a success by partner Ineos Energy

item.title: Trump halts leases for all US offshore wind projects under construction
item.description: Administration suspends all leases with projects under construction due to ‘national security’ considerations

item.title: In a wild year with Trump, oil and gas policy was an oasis of ‘normal’
item.description: Oil prices sank thanks to tariffs and Opec, but permitting moves and sanctions were easily predictable for the GOP king

item.title: Ukraine gains two new routes for gas imports
item.description: Kyiv seeks to boost natural gas import security as domestic gas supplies continue to face Russian attacks

item.title: Viridien completes updated seismic in Brazil pre-salt province
item.description: Campaign covered an area near BP's Bumerangue discovery in the Santos basin

item.title: 快速工作：Orlen 和 DNO 完成挪威股权交易

item.description: 上游》：挪威勘探者为2026年准备了什么？【原文：Upstream takes a look at what Norwegian explorers have in store for 2026】

item.title: 哈萨克斯坦第三大石油项目谈判目标为 2026 年
item.description: 国家计划与卡拉恰干纳克公司的股东展开会谈，因为数十亿美元的仲裁申请有望获得成功【原文：Country plans to open talks with Karachaganak shareholders amid expectations of success in a multibillion dollar arbitration claim】

item.title: 中东重量级承包商在沙特阿拉伯获得多项海上工程总承包（EPCI）交易
item.description: 据上游了解，这些 EPCI 项目是阿美石油公司与离岸承包商签订的长期协议 (LTA) 框架的一部分。【原文：Upstream understands that the EPCI projects are part of Aramco’s coveted long term agreement (LTA) framework with offshore contractors】

item.title: 中东重量级承包商在沙特阿拉伯近海获得多项交易
item.description: 据上游了解，这些 EPCI 项目是阿美石油公司与离岸承包商签订的长期协议 (LTA) 框架的一部分。【原文：Upstream understands that the EPCI projects are part of Aramco’s coveted long term agreement (LTA) framework with offshore contractors】

item.title: 澳大利亚参与方就塞内加尔离岸资产达成重要协议
item.description: 该澳大利亚能源巨头早些时候向 Far 公司索赔 603 万美元，涉及 2021 年出售其在 Sangomar 公司的权益。【原文：The Australian energy giant had earlier claimed $6.03 million from Far related to the sale of its interest in Sangomar in 2021】

item.title: 国有运营商启动南海关键浅水资产

item.title: Saipem确认获得全球最大海上气田数十亿美元的EPCI合同
item.description: 卡塔尔正在花费巨资扩建北部油田，同时还在实施多阶段海上可持续发展项目【原文：Qatar is spending heavily on expanding the North Field while also carrying out the multi-phase offshore sustainability project】

item.title: 四家公司争夺 40 多亿美元的中东项目大奖

item.title: 钻井船抵达保加利亚深水勘探现场
item.description: 钻机将以 OMV Petrom 的勘探区为目标，该勘探区距离土耳其水域发现的大型 Goktepe 天然气勘探区不远。【原文：Rig will target OMV Petrom's prospect not far from big Goktepe discovery gas find in Turkish waters where appraisal well flows gas to surface】

item.title: 天然气泄漏后巴西国家石油公司关闭坎波斯盆地平台
item.description: 没有关于何时恢复 P-40 平台产出的时间表【原文：No timeframe as to when output from the P-40 platform will be resumed】

item.title: 能源转让公司暂停美国液化天然气项目
item.description: 查尔斯湖液化天然气（LNG）是一个天然气进口设施，Energy Transfer 正在将其改造成一个出口终端。【原文：Lake Charles LNG is a gas import facility that Energy Transfer is transforming into an export terminal】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司就深水项目作出最终投资决定
item.description: 巴西运营商预计将于 2026 年上半年与 SBM Offshore 完成有关塞尔希培-阿拉戈斯深水项目的谈判【原文：Brazilian operator expects to conclude negotiations with SBM Offshore in the first half of 2026 for Sergipe-Alagoas Deepwater scheme】

item.title: 南苏丹领导人因创建世界上 "最腐败 "的国家而受到抨击
item.description: 美国、英国和挪威呼吁萨尔瓦-基尔总统和宿敌基尔-马查尔结束石油资源丰富的国家的冲突【原文：US, UK and Norway call on President Salva Kiir and arch rival Kier Machar to end conflict in oil-rich nation】

item.description: Harbour Energy and Petoro team up for success on latest well
